title: A line graph titled "Unemployment 1929 to 1942 is

content.question: Which of the following was most responsible for the change shown between 1938 and 1942 on the chart above?

choices.label: The illness and death of unemployed workers
A redefinition of unemployment by the United States Census Bureau
Legislation of the second New Deal
Industrial mobilization related to the Second World War
A global economic boom following the Great Depression

content.answer: Industrial mobilization related to the Second World War

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
